About Us

At MyLucky1, we connect people, cargo, and carriers—delivering reliable transportation solutions tailored to your needs. As a licensed and bonded freight broker, we specialize in streamlining the logistics process between shippers and carriers, ensuring that every load is handled with precision, care, and professionalism.

Who We Are

We’re not just intermediaries—we’re logistics partners. With years of experience in the transportation industry, our team understands the challenges of shipping, scheduling, and communication. Whether you’re moving a single unit or managing complex freight operations, we bring efficiency, transparency, and consistency to every step of the process.

Our Mission

To simplify freight transport for shippers and carriers by delivering responsive service, clear communication, and dependable logistics management. We treat every load like it matters—because to you, it does.

Our Values

At the heart of our operations are the values that drive everything we do:

Integrity

We build trust through honest communication, fair practices, and transparent operations—always putting our clients’ interests first.

Reliability

We do what we say, and we do it on time. You can count on us to deliver consistent results and dependable service from start to finish.

Partnership

We believe in building long-term relationships, not one-time transactions. Whether you're a shipper or a carrier, we treat you as part of our team.

Excellence

We pursue high standards in every interaction—offering proactive communication, efficient coordination, and continuous improvement.

Accountability

We take full ownership of our commitments. If challenges arise, we solve them—quickly, respectfully, and professionally.

Let’s Move Forward

Whether you're shipping a motorcycle across the country, relocating heavy equipment, or managing a fleet of deliveries, we’re here to make it easier. Trust Lucky1 to be the reliable link in your supply chain.
